sentences.en: ...he will meet with officials from several countries to discuss ways to promote good governance.
sentences.cn: ...他将与诸国官员会面，讨论如何促进对国家的良性管理。

sentences.en: A variety of governance . Automation equipment design and manufacturing.
sentences.cn: 自动化设备设计与制造.

sentences.en: Additionally, a governance deficit a key source of this problem.
sentences.cn: 此外, 管理方法的欠缺是这个问题的主要根源.

sentences.en: B . Adjusting the governance structure of the World Bank Group.
sentences.cn: 调整世界银行集团的治理结构.

sentences.en: But China's market clout is not matched by its governance prowess.
sentences.cn: 但是,中国对市场的影响,与其治理能力并不相符.

sentences.en: Code on Corporate Governance Practices: impact on boardroom behaviour.
sentences.cn: 企业管治常规守则>对董事行为之影响.

sentences.en: Continue to strengthen corporate governance, sound internal control system.
sentences.cn: 继续加强公司治理, 完善内部控制体系.

sentences.en: GRC means Governance , Risk, and Compliance.
sentences.cn: GRC亦 即Governance,Risk& Compliance(治理 、 风险和遵循).

sentences.en: How to ensure access and openness in public governance?
sentences.cn: 如何确保公共管理中的信息公开性?

sentences.en: Humanity also lost their spiritual leadership and governance as a result.
sentences.cn: 人类因而也丧失了他们灵性的领导层和统辖.

sentences.en: Internal control is an efficient guarantee to corporate governance.
sentences.cn: 内部控制是公司治理的有效保证.

sentences.en: So we have reams of publications on governance, structures and strategies.
sentences.cn: 因此,我们拥有大量关于治理 、 结构和战略方面的出版物.

sentences.en: The inside factors include corporation governance and performance evaluation standards.
sentences.cn: 内部的主要影响因素包括:公司治理和业绩评价标准.

sentences.en: They believe that a fundamental change in the governance of Britain is the key to all other necessary changes.
sentences.cn: 他们认为从根本上改变英国的统治方式是促成其他所有必要变革的关键所在。

sentences.en: This governance will arise to the conditions of our world not yours.
sentences.cn: 治理将出现但根据的是我们世界的情况不是你们的.
不健全的法律统治不长.
